reviewText: Unfortunately it did not meet my expectations, I only recieved disc 3 of the season when I was expecting to get all of season 4. Very disappointed :(
The same thing happened to me. I bought Wildfire season 4, and it only had disc 3 in it. Want a Refund!

We love Wildfire the TV Series, BUT........Amazon did not make it clear that this DVD was only 1 disc out of the four discs that make up season 4.  I just want to make sure that no one makes this mistake again.  We received the disc, watched it, and traded it in for yet an undetermined amount. I turned right around and bought the complete season 4 that states it has 4 discs.  No sense in having a duplicate dvd.  Now we are anxiously awaiting the arrival of the complete season four.

One disk only - deceptive advertising. The label on the disk does not look like any other label I have on the 1,2,3 series disks. Series three has three disks total.  I would say it is a knock-off.  The disk is cheap and the label is funky.

CAN YOU PEOPLE EVEN READ? Do any of you even BOTHER to read the product details before buying??
THIS ITEM COMES ONLY WITH ONE DISC, IT IS NOT THE WHOLE SEASON.
I keep ordering this season's series and keep getting incomplete cases EVERYTIME!! I wish that I would get a full season disc sometime. This has been going on for month - missing discs in my order.
One disc in the package, yet the most expensive of all the Wildfire DVDs.  I would not have ordered this if it had clearly been marked this way.
It's only one disc.  You don't even get the whole series.  People do not buy this!!  They are screwing everyone that thinks they are getting the whole series.
I cant believe i didn't read the reviews. didn't realize until i recieved this in the mail that it was only one disk of the season. so disappointed.
I thought this was the whole season but instead it was only one disc with a few episodes from the fourth season on it.  Very deceiving:(
same as other buyers!!! buyer beware=only 1 disc = NOT KOOL; especially when it was purchased & delivered  as a BDAY/XMAS gift...so embarrassing...
Very misleading.. this does NOT come with all 4 disc of the season.
